table.title: Select an Index
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes | stats count by title | rename title AS index | fields - count

table.title: Deep Dive on Host ($server_host$) / Index ($index_index$)
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | table title, eai:acl.app, disabled, totalEventCount, currentDBSizeMB, homePath, coldPath, thawedPath | rename title AS Index eai:acl.app AS App disabled AS Disabled totalEventCount AS "Event Count" currentDBSizeMB AS "Size in MiB" homePath AS "Home Path" coldPath AS "Cold Path" thawedPath AS "Thawed Path"

table.title: Deep Dive on Host ($server_host$) / Index ($index_index$)
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes-extended/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | join type=left splunk_server, title [ | rest /services/data/indexes/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | fields title, splunk_server, maxHotBuckets, maxWarmDBCount ] | fillnull value=0 bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count | table title, bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count, maxHotBuckets, bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count, maxWarmDBCount, bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count, bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count | rename title AS Index bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count AS "Hot Buckets" maxHotBuckets AS "Max Hot Count" bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count AS "Warm Buckets" maxWarmDBCount AS "Max Warm Count" bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count AS "Cold Buckets" bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count AS "Thawed Buckets"

table.title: Deep Dive on Host ($server_host$) / Index ($index_index$)
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes-extended/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | join type=left splunk_server, title [ | rest /services/data/indexes/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | fields title, splunk_server, frozenTimePeriodInSecs ] | fillnull value="N/A" bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time bucket_dirs.thawed.event_min_time bucket_dirs.thawed.event_max_time | eval freeze=tostring(frozenTimePeriodInSecs, "duration") | eval frozen_cutoff_time = now() - frozenTimePeriodInSecs | convert ctime(frozen_cutoff_time) | table title, bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time bucket_dirs.thawed.event_min_time bucket_dirs.thawed.event_max_time frozenTimePeriodInSecs, frozenTimePeriodInSecs, freeze, frozen_cutoff_time | foreach bucket_dirs.* [ | eval <<FIELD>>=if(isint('<<FIELD>>'), strftime('<<FIELD>>', "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"), '<<FIELD>>') ] | rename title AS Index bucket_dirs.home.event_min_time AS "Earliest Home Time" bucket_dirs.home.event_max_time AS "Latest Home Time" bucket_dirs.cold.event_min_time AS "Earliest Cold Time" bucket_dirs.cold.event_max_time AS "Latest Cold Time" bucket_dirs.thawed.event_min_time AS "Earliest Thawed Time" bucket_dirs.thawed.event_max_time AS "Latest Thawed Time" frozenTimePeriodInSecs AS "Frozen Limit (sec)" freeze AS "Frozen Limit" frozen_cutoff_time AS "Frozen Cutoff"

table.title: Deep Dive on Host ($server_host$) / Index ($index_index$)
table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes-extended/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | join type=left splunk_server, title [ | rest /services/data/indexes/$index_index$ splunk_server=$server_host$ | fields title, splunk_server, homePath.maxDataSizeMB, coldPath.maxDataSizeMB, maxTotalDataSizeMB ] | fillnull value=0 bucket_dirs.home.size bucket_dirs.cold.size bucket_dirs.thawed.size | eval comp_pct=tostring(round(total_size / total_raw_size * 100, 2)) + "%" | eval comp_ratio=tostring(round(total_raw_size / total_size, 2)) + "::1" | table title, bucket_dirs.home.size, homePath.maxDataSizeMB, bucket_dirs.cold.size, coldPath.maxDataSizeMB, bucket_dirs.thawed.size, total_raw_size, total_size, maxTotalDataSizeMB, comp_pct, comp_ratio | rename title AS Index bucket_dirs.home.size AS "Home Path Size" homePath.maxDataSizeMB AS "Home Path Limit" bucket_dirs.cold.size AS "Cold Path Size" coldPath.maxDataSizeMB AS "Home Path Limit" bucket_dirs.thawed.size AS "Thawed Path Size" total_raw_size AS "Raw Size" total_size AS "Total Size" maxTotalDataSizeMB AS "Max Total Size" comp_pct AS "Compression %" comp_ratio AS "Compression Ratio"
